name: hv_vmx_capability_t
desc: The type that describes Virtual Machine Extensions (VMX) capability fields.

items.name: var HV_VMX_CAP_PINBASED: hv_vmx_capability_t
items.desc: Field ID for pin-based capabilities.

items.name: var HV_VMX_CAP_PROCBASED: hv_vmx_capability_t
items.desc: Field ID for primary proc-based capabilities.

items.name: var HV_VMX_CAP_PROCBASED2: hv_vmx_capability_t
items.desc: Field ID for secondary proc-based capabilities.

items.name: var HV_VMX_CAP_ENTRY: hv_vmx_capability_t
items.desc: Field ID for VM entry capabilities.

items.name: var HV_VMX_CAP_EXIT: hv_vmx_capability_t
items.desc: Field ID for VM exit capabilities.

items.name: var HV_VMX_CAP_BASIC: hv_vmx_capability_t
items.desc: Field ID for basic VMX capabilities.

items.name: var HV_VMX_CAP_TRUE_PINBASED: hv_vmx_capability_t
items.desc: Field ID for hardware pin-based VMX capabilities.

items.name: var HV_VMX_CAP_TRUE_PROCBASED: hv_vmx_capability_t
items.desc: Field ID for primary process-based VMX capabilities.

items.name: var HV_VMX_CAP_TRUE_ENTRY: hv_vmx_capability_t
items.desc: Field ID for hardware VM-entry VMX capabilities.

items.name: var HV_VMX_CAP_TRUE_EXIT: hv_vmx_capability_t
items.desc: Field ID for hardware VM-exit VMX capabilities.

items.name: var HV_VMX_CAP_MISC: hv_vmx_capability_t
items.desc: Field ID for miscellaneous VMX capabilities.

items.name: var HV_VMX_CAP_CR0_FIXED0: hv_vmx_capability_t
items.desc: Field ID for CR0 allowed, zero-bits VMX capability.

items.name: var HV_VMX_CAP_CR0_FIXED1: hv_vmx_capability_t
items.desc: Field ID for CR0 allowed, one-bits VMX capability.

items.name: var HV_VMX_CAP_CR4_FIXED0: hv_vmx_capability_t
items.desc: Fields ID for CR4 allowed, zero-bits VMX capability.

items.name: var HV_VMX_CAP_CR4_FIXED1: hv_vmx_capability_t
items.desc: Field ID for CR4 allowed, one-bits VMX capability.

items.name: var HV_VMX_CAP_VMCS_ENUM: hv_vmx_capability_t
items.desc: Field ID for VMCS enumeration capability.

items.name: var HV_VMX_CAP_EPT_VPID_CAP: hv_vmx_capability_t
items.desc: Field ID for EPT/VPID VMX capabilities.

items.name: var HV_VMX_CAP_PREEMPTION_TIMER: hv_vmx_capability_t
items.desc: Field ID for preemption timer frequency.

items.name: init(UInt32)
items.desc: Creates a new Virtual Machine Extensions (VMX) instance.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt32)
items.desc: Creates a new Virtual Machine Extensions (VMX) instance with the value you provide.

items.name: var rawValue: UInt32
items.desc: An unsigned 32-bit integer that represents the Virtual Machine Extensions (VMX) fields.
